EmailTemplate.name: updated template GRA
EmailTemplate.subject: Georgia Realtors and Office Depot
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear ,
Georgia REALTORS is excited to bring you an exclusive member benefit program provided by Office Depot and OfficeMax, that is not available to the general public. As a member of Georgia REALTORS, you can save up to 80% on thousands of items.
Online orders over $50 receive free next-day delivery to your home or office.
! Businesses can enroll in account billing for added convenience. Find all the essential items you need to keep your home and business running as efficiently
Exclusive Georgia REALTORS member discounts Up to 80% off preferred products Thousands of products discounted below retail
We are glad to offer this savings program as an exclusive benefit of your membership. Please contact Mike at the information below to have him set up a business profile.
Sincerely, Mike Miller Sr. Inside Sales Representative - Preferred Accounts | Office Depot, Inc. 9501 Amberglen Blvd | Austin, TX 78729 Tel: 855-337-6811 Ext 16060| mike.miller@officedepot.com Office Depot | Max
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The information contained in this email and attached document(s) may contain confidential information that is intended only for the addressee(s). If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby advised that any disclosure, copying, distribution or the taking of any action in reliance upon the information is prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please immediately notify the sender and delete it from your system.
